name: Dodger (justice-bole)
description:
Dodger is a minimalist racing game inspired by retro LCD handheld games. Gain score as you overtake other vehicles and speed up your racer to increase the challenge, just be careful not to crash! Listen to some catchy electronic beats while you try to increase your score.

🎮 Controls:

  • A to move left
  • D to move right
  • W to speed up
  • R to restart

🎵 Music by :

  • Jahzzar - Comedie
  • Line Noise - Magenta Moon Part II
  • PARADIGM - Fiat Lux
  • Plurabelle - Light, Livid
  • Scott Holmes Music - Neon Nights
  • Timecrawler 82 - Turbulence

Check out some of my other stuff here on itch:

  • Tower Knights ♞ - A strategy tower siege game, take your opponent's tower!
  • Poseidon 🐡 - An underwater top-down shooter with a twist!
  • Unity FPS Character Controller 🔫 - Ready to use FPS character for Unity.
  • My Itch Page 📄 - Everything I've uploaded to itch can be found here!

Please, leave a rating 🌟 and a comment 💬 letting me know what I can improve, I always appreciate any feedback! Click "More Info" if you'd like to see the source code, my developer website, or my Twitter information. If you have any requests on what I should work on next let me know down below 👇.
